actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual's earnings in months before his or her first month of entitlement to benefits thereunder shall not be taken into account in determining whether or not such benefits (for the year in which such first month falls) are subject to deduction under the earnings test.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide that, in the taxable year in which an individual became eligible for monthly insurance benefits, an individual's earnings for months before the first month of eligiblity shall not be taken into account in determining whether or not such benefits are subject to deduction because of the earnings limitation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that an individual's earnings in months before his or her first month of entitlement to benefits thereunder shall not be taken into account in determining whether or not such benefits (for the year in which such first month falls) are subject to deduction under the earnings test.
